body: ... if I change the input method to "Graft" for the _bldgMasses input node on the split building mass component for this form C05, the calculation will stop at zone 31 with the following errors: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Y05Evaa5liHbpoAT2c16DvgEksXejD6hTEXft2ly06dK9NMek-bTCB90FUD29dvKqcoYlnjVXe5LQ1fLExnYfksPLQ0GoDW6/Image11.png)
